bio: This kingly Yo-kai is adored by all of his fellow zombies. His tenacity remains, even as his body decays.

soultimate.name: Cluvian Claymore
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Drops incoming damage by 20% and gives super armor.
skill.name: Dead Stubborn

name: King Deadward
